name: Spaceroach Records
description:
This is a build from GB Studio for a game idea. In talking with a friend (who knows how to code and is helping with Gunpowder Tea), we decided that just like Gunpowder Tea, my ideas are too much for GB Studio. Especially with my lack of coding knowledge.

I owe my jumping into making games to GB Studio, but it's time to jump to the next thing. We're now in the early stages of making Spaceroach Records in modern game engines, with hopes of a full proper release.

For now, I hope you enjoy this version. It will likely change - and it will have much more music - but I'm proud of what we did in here.
